result.title: Empirical working paper with policy implications using deliverable 2.1
result.description: Using the new dataset (deliverable 2.1), this sub-task aims to empirically assess, through panel data analysis, whether and how the degree of uncertainty in forecasts is related to the business cycle and, in particular, if forecasts tend to be less reliable around turning points of the cycle, which is when accuracy would be most relevant.

project.title: Fiscal Rules and Strategies under Externalities and Uncertainties

programme.title: SOCIETAL CHALLENGES - Europe In A Changing World - Inclusive, Innovative And Reflective Societies

programme.title: Resilient and sustainable economic and monetary union in Europe

category.title: Topic
category.description: Programme: Part of the Commission work programme implementing legal basis

result.title: Working paper on the MIP Scoreboard
result.description: The paper performs an in-depth ex-post analysis of the appropriateness of the indicators included in the MIP Scoreboard. We ask whether this system would have been able to effectively identify the potential macroeconomic imbalances if it had been applied before the financial crisis. The ex-post evaluation will include in some cases recalculation of the MIP Scoreboard which covers external imbalances, internal imbalances and competitiveness. The statistical analysis will cover each of the 28 member states.

project.title: Fiscal Rules and Strategies under Externalities and Uncertainties

programme.title: SOCIETAL CHALLENGES - Europe In A Changing World - Inclusive, Innovative And Reflective Societies

category.title: Topic
category.description: Programme: Part of the Commission work programme implementing legal basis

result.title: Working paper on the credibility of EU fiscal instruments
result.description: This paper uses an agency framework to consider the enforcement of desired fiscal policy as a dynamic game between Member States governments and EU authorities. Using the model, we retrospectively analyse the efficiency of the incentive schemes before and after the reforms in 2011.

result.title: Research report about the fiscal multipliers
result.description: This paper presents quantitative estimates of fiscal multipliers in individual members of the Euro Area using the National Institutes global econometric model NiGEM. It also examines whether international coordination of fiscal policies strengthens or weakens the size of multipliers in individual countries.

result.title: Report on existing Grouping Strategies (NANoREG, OECD, ECHA or others) and available datasets from other projects (e.g. NANoREG, NanoTEST, MARINA) State of the Art Analysis
result.description: Content: Report on the existing grouping strategies based on ongoing activities in other projects (e.g. NanoREG I, Nanosolution, NanoMile or others) or from organizations like OECD, ECHA, ECETOC. This will be compiled as an state-of the art description. In parallel we will identify available datasets for developing grouping from other finished or nearly finished projects. Impact: This is the basis for our own work to be done in Task 1.4

result.title: Report on the findings of the comparative analysis of the efficiency of the budgetary-monetary-financial policy mix in selected OECD countries
result.description: In order to understand the specific problems of macroeconomic conditions within the EMU, this paper examine the evolution of budgetary, monetary and financial performance indicators and provides a comparative analysis of the budgetary-monetary-financial policy mix in major OECD countries.

result.title: Tools to find and supply geospatial data-streams from Copernicus services to downstream service providers
result.description: The Maps-API and SDL (as described in chapter 1.3.1) will be extended, adding a new RESTful Web Services interface to ensure that the original and enhanced geospatial data streams (output of WP 3.1) are easily discoverable and consumable by the downstream services, most notably (but not limited to) the semantic linkage process as part of WP4 where EO data-streams are combined with other open-data and transformed into RDFs to be published in the linked-data cloud.

result.title: Working paper on comparing unemployment insurance schemes
result.description: This paper compares alternative proposals for a central unemployment insurance systems. It empirically tests the relationship between the functioning and the size of alternative instruments and assesses their impact on output volatility and losses.

result.title: Document describing a blueprint for the creation of trusted environments per stage gate to share information among stakeholders/actors
result.description: Content : Report in which an analysis of required conditions and organization to create an environment in which stakeholders can share information relevant for decision making, each from their point of view, in how to proceed with new nanomaterials. The report will contain a template or blueprint for each stage gate, describing identifiable boundaries and tolerances (including IP issues) which provide interested stakeholders and actors with incontrovertible data for decision making at each gate. draft m12, update m24 final m36

result.title: Synthesis report on the benchmark conducted in the field of new data fields in offices
result.description: This report will provide an exhaustive review of the potential of new data fields and alternative sources of measurement applicable in office building. result.title: Public web portal
result.description: The web portal will be initiated within the second month of project start date and reviewed and updated regularly during the lifetime of the project. It will present a collection of simple non-technical explanations of the goals and findings of the project and any published work to arise out of the project. It will be populated with content from the pilot sites and research findings as the project progresses.
